scripts.start-info: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && if [ ! -d src-frontend/dist ]; then mkdir src-frontend/dist; fi && cargo build --lib --features wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir src-frontend/turbocharger_generated --out-name index --target web target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/turbocharger_generated.wasm && { npx vite > /dev/null & RUST_LOG=info cargo run --bin turbocharger-template-dioxus; }
scripts.wasm-only: cargo build --lib --features wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir src-frontend/turbocharger_generated --out-name index --target web target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/turbocharger_generated.wasm
scripts.start-info-release-wasm: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && if [ ! -d src-frontend/dist ]; then mkdir src-frontend/dist; fi && cargo build --release --lib --features wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir src-frontend/turbocharger_generated --out-name index --target web target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/turbocharger_generated.wasm && { npx vite > /dev/null & RUST_LOG=info cargo run; }
scripts.start-debug: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && if [ ! -d src-frontend/dist ]; then mkdir src-frontend/dist; fi && cargo build --lib --features wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir src-frontend/turbocharger_generated --out-name index --target web target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/turbocharger_generated.wasm && { npx vite > /dev/null & RUST_LOG=debug cargo run; }
scripts.update-js-deps: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
